Homecoming Spirit Week

Monday: Movie Day- Dress like your favorite movie character or actor.

Tuesday: White Lie- Make up a funny saying that is the exact opposite of what you are, Either tape it to your shirt or write it on a white t-shirt. Also picture day.

Wednesday: Pirates vs ninja- Dress as your favorite between the two. No face coverings allowed.

Thursday: Dress like your type- Dress up as who you like. Example; country boys, city girls etc..

Friday: Blackout Day- Wear all black and come support the Volleyball team for senior night. Pep Assembly 4th Hour.

Saturday: Homecoming Dance, “A Night at the Movies”, 8-11:30pm

Week of December 20th & 27th, 2021

Coach Paul Childs was inducted into the ASAA Wrestling Hall of Fame this past weekend. Congratulations Paul!

Even though it’s Christmas break, VHS student-athletes are practicing and participating in various events.

Our Boys and Girls Varsity Basketball team will be traveling to Ketchikan on Sunday, December 26th, and playing in the Clarke Cochrane Christmas Tournament. Valdez Boy vs. Metlakatla @ 2:15 p.m. on Tuesday, Dec. 28th, and Valdez Girls vs. Petersburg @ 4:00 p.m.

The Nordic Ski team will be practicing in anticipation of their annual Valdez Nordic Ski Invite which will be January 7th & 8th. We will be hosting West Valley, North Pole, and Lathrop ski teams.

Week of December 13th, 2021

Wrestling @ State, Traditional student body send-off on Thurs. @ 8:15am

Basketball & Cheer Parent Night: Monday, November 29th @ 6:30 p.m. in the VHS Cafetorium. If you haven’t already participated in a sport this year please go online and do the registration paperwork @ www. planeths.com

The basketball teams will be competing at State on March 25-27. For more information on the Covid mitigation, tickets, and game times go to asaa.org/activities/ basketball/.

Tournament brackets have not been announced yet. However, below is some information for those that might be attending the Tournament:

ASAA MARCH MADNESS ALASKA TICKETS

As part of ASAA’s Covid Mitigations, the number of tickets for each game is limited. Each school will be allowed only 125 tickets per game. Please review the ticket information document linked below.

ASAA March Madness Alaska Ticket Information (Updated 3/12/21)

Week of Nov 2nd

VHS was scheduled to host the Aurora Conference Volleyball Championships this week. Many of the teams have cancelled due to positive Covid cases. Right now, Hutchison is the only regional team planning to attend. Grace Christian has agreed to travel to Valdez for a three team round robin format on Friday night starting @ 4pm. Below is the schedule for Friday:

Game #1: Grace Christian vs. Hutchison @ 4pm

Game #2: Valdez vs. Grace Christian @ 6pm

Game #3: Valdez vs. Hutchison @ 8pm (This game will be the Aurora Conference Championship game)

Double elimination tournament: Saturday beginning @ 10am, championship game around 4pm. All games will be streamed live at youtube.com/c/ VCSStreamTeam.
